message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early!
You could have had a fair split, now I'm taking a bit more!
You're taking a bit more than fair, so I'm taking a bit more too!
You're trying to take the majority, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'm not going to let you take all the advantage.
You think you're getting the better deal, but I'm still holding out for more!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm not going to let you take advantage of me at this point.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a smaller share, but I'm still holding on to hope!
You're running out of time, Bob! I'm taking control now.
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not backing down! I'll take a small share, but I'm not giving up!
You're running out of options, Bob. It's time to accept a deal.
I'm not going down without a fight, but I guess I'll take what I can get!
